myworkspace 0.0.1
  • Reference

List files targeted by `_quarto.yml` `render:` patterns

Source: R/quarto_config.R
list_quarto_render_files.Rd

Reads the `render:` section from a Quarto project file and resolves it to a concrete file list.

list_quarto_render_files(quarto_yml = "_quarto.yml", root_dir = here::here())

Arguments

quarto_yml

Character scalar. Path to `_quarto.yml`, relative to `root_dir` or absolute.

root_dir

Character scalar. Project root used to resolve relative paths. Defaults to `here::here()`.

Value

Character vector of relative file paths matched by `render:` patterns.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
list_quarto_render_files()
} # }
